name: Ollie VR Beta
description:
Ollie is a VR animation tool designed for beginners. We make 3D animation as easy as playing with toys. 

Every week, we'll post an updated build here along with detailed release notes. Download Ollie below (Oculus Rift and HTC Vive only, Windows MR support coming soon).

To ensure that Ollie is shaped by the VR / animation community while the product is in its nascent stages, we want you to be involved in our design / development process as early as possible. If you have feedback on Ollie or questions for us, please contact our team directly via email. 

To see work made with Ollie, follow us on Instagram and Twitter. To learn more, visit our website at ollievr.com. 

Release Notes and Known Issues
